quotes: Mathematics is the language with which God has written the universe.

Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.

You are not just skin and bones. You are blood and stories.

There is nothing permanent except change.

With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
Electricity is really just organized lightning.
The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven.
I do not fear computers. I fear the lack of them.
It is not length of life, but depth of life.
Look up at the stars and not down at your feet.

Breathe. Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is the only one you know you have for sure.

Keep your heart open to dreams. For as long as there's a dream, there is hope.

Be like water making its way through cracks.
